SQRT2
===
> [Square root][sqrt] of `2`.


<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var SQRT2 = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-sqrt-two' );
```

#### SQRT2

[Square root][sqrt] of `2`.

``` javascript
SQRT2 === 1.4142135623730951;
```
<!-- </usage> -->

<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var SQRT2 = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-sqrt-two' );

console.log( SQRT2 );
// returns 1.4142135623730951
```
<!-- </examples> -->

<!-- <links> -->
<!-- FIXME -->
[sqrt]: https://github.com/math-io/sqrt
<!-- </links> -->
